info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: Bloodbath
collection.openText: Many hands float in the bath. They are the hands of the people I once loved.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When #0, who had Level 1 Fortitude, completed the work process, a hand stretched out of $0 and dragged #0 into its depths. The same phenomenon occurred with an Agent who had Level 1 Temperance.
A pale hand surfaced from $0 after it had absorbed an employee. As the number of hands increased, the number of PE-Boxes produced with it also increased.
<Caution> When $0 has three hands, the safety of the next worker cannot be guaranteed. It seems $0 will absorb employees regardless of the work result or virtue levels.
